bill.summary:
Small Business Broadband and Emerging Information Technology Enhancement Act of 2017
This bill directs the Small Business Administration to designate a senior Office of Investment and Innovation employee as broadband and emerging information technology coordinator. The coordinator's responsibilities shall include identifying best practices relating to broadband and emerging information technology that may help small businesses.
